backyard.description: Our new plantings are starting to look mature.  And pretty.
backyard.title: Backyard

brothers1.description: Felix and Milo are starting to be on better terms.  The main reason?  Milo, thank God, is finally starting to pay attention to Felix's "no"s.
brothers1.title: Brothers 1

brothers3.description: On the occasions that Milo doesn't go with Lucie to pick up Felix from school, Felix asks where he is and says he wants to see him.
brothers3.title: Brothers 3

brothers4.description: Milo, of course, loves any attention big bro chooses to bestow.
brothers4.title: Brothers 4

brothers6.description: Sharing a book while Mom cooks dinner.
brothers6.title: Brothers 6

milo_basketball.description: Milo loves sports.   Felix can take 'em or leave 'em, but Milo's need to throw balls seems baked-in.
milo_basketball.title: Milo Basketball

milo_slide2.description: Don't ask Dean how he knows, but he's sure Milo's more snowboarder than skier.
milo_slide2.title: Milo Slide 2

milo_swing3.description: Dean and Milo's preferred way to exit is jumping off, in full swing, at the apex.
milo_swing3.title: Milo Swing 3

milo_swing4.description: Don't fly too close to the sun, your wings are made of wax!
milo_swing4.title: Milo Swing 4

milo_swing5.description: Felix's preferred method of swinging.  He learned it at age 1 with nanny Sylvie and he's sticking with it.
milo_swing5.title: Milo Swing 5

slide.description: <u>Webbing</u>: (verb).  The practice of stopping oneself in mid-slide by grabbing the rail, as if one's hands had webs like Spiderman.  Felix thought the word needed to exist, so it does now.
slide.title: Slide

superman.description: Contemplating superhumanity from the stuffed animal box.
superman.title: Superman

description:
Indian summer is here: it's balmy, warm, just durn pleasant. This weekend we hit a harvest festival a few blocks from our house and ran into many many neighbors. The close community is one of the great things about Berkeley.

Milo's teething. He's really hurting. It's mostly okay when he's Tylenoled to the eyeballs, but he lets everyone know about it the second it wears off. One of the teeth broke through the gum today, so hopefully it will be over soon.

School's good. Felix is enjoying his friends, especially Owen and Torin. Lucie came to pick up Felix a bit early from school one day and got a "Why are you here? I'm still playing!" Also, we went to a PTA meeting. The teachers are all great. The parents are interesting and involved.
title: October 2
